messages.title: Look what the Lib Dems have stopped the Tories doing:
messages.content: Plans to cut public sector wages outside the South East were confirmed by the Chancellor. But Mr Osborne faced criticism from the Lib Dems following negative reaction from the Liberal Democrats.

messages.title: and what the Liberal Democrats are doing to help you and your family
messages.content: Lib Dems pledge to raise income tax allowance to £12,500 a year. The Lib Dems have pledged the extra funding. [£800m for our NHS]

messages.title: OFFICIAL: THE SNP ARE BAD FOR YOUR HEALTH
messages.content:
Cancer targets MISSED
A&E in CRISIS
Hospital bed SHORTAGE
Health spending SLASHED
The SNP have been cutting health spending in Scotland while England's NHS spent more.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems pledge to raise income tax tax allowance to £12,500 a year.
The Lib Dems have pledged the extra funding. [£800m for our NHS]

mentions.tacticalSituation: In large parts of the country the Conservatives are out of the race. Only the Lib Dems can stop the SNP.

issues.health: The SNP have been cutting health spending in Scotland while England's NHS spent more. The Lib Dems have pledged to raise £800m for our NHS.

endorsements.endorsement: Leaked Tory memo a 'letter of surrender'?
Tory election blunder reveals 'no hope' candidates

Raising the personal income tax allowance to £12,500 will be a key Lib Dem demand in any coalition after the 2015 election. Businesses will be encouraged by the scale of the Liberal Democrats' economic ambition – building Europe's largest economy over the next 20 years.

quotes.text: I'd govern like a true Tory if it wasn't for the Lib Dems.

images.caption: David Cameron's statement expressing governance handicapped by the Liberal Democrats.
